openDescoPortalMsg: This will copy your account ID "{{accountNo}}" to the clipboard and open the official DESCO customer portal in a new tab. You can then paste your account ID to log in.
deleteAccountMsg: Are you sure you want to delete account "{{accountNo}}"? This action cannot be undone and all account data will be permanently removed.
balanceWarningMessage: Balance information is temporarily unavailable for account(s): {{accountList}}
tip1: Tip: You can view your monthly trends in the dashboard below.
tip2: Did you know? AI can help you optimize your electricity usage!
tip3: Tip: Recharge before your balance runs low to avoid interruptions.
aiAnalysisMayTakeTime: This may take a few moments due to the complexity of the analysis.
aiAnalysisStillWorking: Still working‚Ä¶ Sorry for the delay! Sometimes this takes a bit longer.
balanceUnavailableMsg: Your balance information is currently unavailable. Balance-related insights are not included in the analysis below.
name: Name
balanceInfoUnavailableDesc: Balance info is currently unavailable. Possible reasons:
balanceInfoAutoUpdate: Info will update automatically when available.
sectionPreferencesDescription: Choose which sections you want to see expanded by default. Your preferences will be remembered across sessions.
appSubtitle: Be wise with your Desco account: your electricity accounts, simplified.
noAccountsSubtitle: You haven't added any electricity accounts.
sectionInfoDescription: Learn how this section can help you understand and manage your electricity usage.

aiInsightsInfo.title: AI-Powered Insights
aiInsightsInfo.description: Get personalized, actionable suggestions based on your usage patterns. Use these insights to identify opportunities for savings, efficiency, and smarter electricity habits.
benefits: Discover unusual consumption trends and get tips to optimize usage.
Receive AI-driven recommendations for reducing your bill.
Spot inefficiencies or potential issues early.

consumerInfoInfo.title: Consumer Information
consumerInfoInfo.description: Review your account and location details. Ensuring this information is accurate helps you receive relevant insights and support.
benefits: Verify your account details for accurate billing and service.
Update information to receive tailored advice.
Understand your tariff and eligibility for special programs.

accountBalanceInfo.title: Account Balance
accountBalanceInfo.description: Monitor your current balance to avoid unexpected power interruptions. Stay proactive by recharging before your balance runs low.
benefits: Prevent service disruption by tracking your balance.
Plan recharges to avoid last-minute rushes.
Spot unusual deductions or errors early.

consumptionChartInfo.title: Consumption Chart
consumptionChartInfo.description: Visualize your electricity usage over time. Identify high-usage periods and adjust habits to save energy and money.
benefits: Spot spikes in usage and investigate causes.
Compare usage across days, weeks, or months.
Set goals to reduce consumption during peak times.

rechargeHistoryInfo.title: Recharge History
rechargeHistoryInfo.description: Track your recharge patterns and spending. Use this history to budget better, spot any missed or duplicate payments, and verify the success of your last recharge.
benefits: Identify your average monthly recharge amount.
Plan recharges to align with your budget.
Detect any irregularities in payment history.
Check if your last recharge was successful.
Use the details button to see how much energy cost you actually received and view a full breakdown of charges.

comparisonChartInfo.title: Comparison Chart
comparisonChartInfo.description: Compare your usage or spending with previous periods or similar users. Use this to benchmark your efficiency and set improvement targets.
benefits: See if your usage is above or below average.
Motivate yourself to improve by tracking progress.
Identify months where you performed best.

rechargeVsConsumptionInfo.title: Recharge vs Consumption
rechargeVsConsumptionInfo.description: Understand how your recharges align with your actual consumption. Ensure your payments are keeping up with your usage to avoid running out of balance.
benefits: Balance recharges with actual usage for smoother service.
Spot months where you may be over- or under-recharging.
Adjust recharge habits to match consumption trends.

rechargeDistributionInfo.title: Recharge Distribution
rechargeDistributionInfo.description: See how your recharges are distributed over time. Use this to identify patterns and optimize your recharge schedule.
benefits: Find the most common times you recharge.
Optimize recharge timing for convenience or discounts.
Avoid frequent small recharges by planning ahead.

maxDemandInfo.title: Max Demand
maxDemandInfo.description: Track your peak electricity demand. Reducing peak demand can lower your bill and reduce strain on the grid.
benefits: Identify when your demand is highest and why.
Shift heavy usage to off-peak times if possible.
Avoid exceeding demand thresholds that may incur extra charges.

cumulativeConsumptionInfo.title: Cumulative Consumption
cumulativeConsumptionInfo.description: Monitor your total electricity usage over time. Use this to set long-term goals and track your progress toward efficiency.
benefits: See your overall consumption trend.
Set annual or seasonal reduction targets.
Celebrate milestones in reduced usage.

boxPlotInfo.title: Box Plot
boxPlotInfo.description: Analyze the distribution and variability of your electricity usage. Spot outliers and understand your typical consumption range.
benefits: Identify days with unusually high or low usage.
Understand your typical usage range to set realistic goals.
Spot patterns that may indicate faulty appliances.

monthlyCostTrendInfo.title: Monthly Cost Trend
monthlyCostTrendInfo.description: Track how your electricity costs change month to month. Use this to budget and find ways to reduce your bill.
benefits: Spot months with higher costs and investigate causes.
Track the impact of efficiency improvements on your bill.
Forecast future costs for better financial planning.

clickToAddNewAccount: Click to add a new DESCO account
accountAlreadyAdded: Account {{accountNo}} is already added. Please use a different account number.
accountVerifiedSuccessfully: Account verified successfully! Review the details below.
aiInsightsDescription: AI Insights provide personalized energy and recharge analysis for your account.
banglaLanguageDescription: Enable Bangla to view account details and insights in Bangla.
settingsCanBeChangedLater: You can change these settings later.
dataUpdateNotice: Data is updated daily and shows information up to the previous day. Today's data will be available tomorrow, according to DESCO's schedule.
footerLine1: Data comes from the DESCO open API.
privacyDisclaimer1: This app is <bold>{{affiliation}}</bold>. It is provided for your convenience only.
privacyDisclaimer1_affiliation: not affiliated with or endorsed by DESCO
privacyDisclaimer2: We <bold>{{storage}}</bold>. All information is processed locally in your browser and never leaves your device.
privacyDisclaimer2_storage: do not store or persist any of your account data on our servers
privacyDisclaimer3: Your data is used solely to display your account information and is never shared with third parties.
privacyDisclaimer4: For more information, contact the developer.
supportOrConnect: Support me or connect with me:
thankYouSupport: Thank you for your support! ‚Äî Aabir
onboardingSubtitle: Your smart companion for managing DESCO electricity accounts with AI-powered insights and simplified monitoring.
beyondOfficialPortalDesc: While DESCO has an official portal, DescoWise offers a more intuitive, user-friendly experience with AI-powered insights that help you understand your electricity usage patterns and optimize your consumption.
privacyFirstDesc: Your data never leaves your device. All processing happens locally in your browser, ensuring complete privacy and security of your account information.
aiInsightsFeatureDesc: Get personalized analysis of your consumption patterns and smart recommendations.
smartAnalyticsDesc: Visual charts and trends to understand your electricity usage better.
costOptimizationDesc: Predict bills and optimize recharge timing to save money.
securePrivateDesc: Your data stays on your device. No servers, no tracking.
bilingualSupportDesc: Full support for both English and Bangla languages.
realTimeDataDesc: Get the latest balance and consumption data from DESCO APIs.
step1Desc: Enter your DESCO account number. We'll verify it and fetch your account details.
step2Desc: View your balance, consumption trends, and AI-powered recommendations.
step3Desc: Use the insights to optimize your electricity usage and save money on bills.
importantNoteDesc: DescoWise is an unofficial client that uses DESCO's public APIs. It is not affiliated with or endorsed by DESCO. This app is provided for your convenience and offers enhanced features beyond the official portal.
dataReliabilityDesc: Understanding how we get your account information and what to do when data seems incorrect.
dataSourceDesc: DescoWise gets all your account information directly from DESCO's official systems. We don't have any special access or different data than what DESCO provides.
dataLimitationsDesc: Sometimes DESCO's systems may not show the most current information. This can happen due to:
dataLimitationReason3: Recent meter readings or account changes
dataLimitationNote: These same limitations affect DESCO's official portal and mobile app as well.
whatToDoDesc: If you notice information that seems incorrect or outdated:
whatToDoAction1: Check your physical meter directly for the most accurate reading
whatToDoAction2: Contact DESCO support at 16262 for official assistance
whatToDoAction3: Wait for the next data update (usually within 24 hours)
whatToDoAction4: Use DESCO's official portal as an alternative reference
dataAccuracyNote: We show warnings when data might be unreliable, but always verify critical information with your meter or DESCO directly.
aiUnavailable: AI insights are temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
aiRateLimit: AI insights are temporarily unavailable due to high demand. Please try again in a few minutes.
aiTooMuchData: There is too much data to analyze at once. Please try with fewer accounts or a shorter time range.
aiNetworkIssue: AI insights could not be loaded due to a network issue. Please check your connection and try again.
aiSafetyBlock: AI insights could not be generated due to content restrictions.
aiGenericError: Sorry, something went wrong while generating AI insights. Please try again later.
